name: service_at_location
description: A link between a service and a specific location.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier of the service at location entry. Each entry must have a unique identifier.

service_id.name: service_id
service_id.title: Service Identifier
service_id.description: The identifier of the service at a given location.

location_id.name: location_id
location_id.title: Location Identifier
location_id.description: The identifier of the location where this service operates.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the service at this specific location.
description.example: Counselling Services provided by trained professionals in the MyCity area.

service_areas.name: service_areas
service_areas.title: Service Areas
service_areas.description: The details of the geographic area for which a service is available.

contacts.name: contacts
contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: The details of the named contacts for services and organizations.

phones.name: phones
phones.title: Phones
phones.description: The details of the telephone numbers used to contact organizations, services, and locations.

schedules.name: schedules
schedules.title: Schedules
schedules.description: The details of when a service or location is open. Entries are RFC 5545 RRULES.

location.name: location
location.title: Location
location.description: The details of the locations where organizations operate. Locations may be virtual, and one organization may have many locations.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A link between a service and one or more classifications that describe the nature of the service provided.

metadata.name: metadata
metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: A record of the changes that have been made to the data in order to maintain provenance information.
